description: Swap EBS volumes to restore expected project files from older persistent storage
context: Successfully unmounted /persistent using lazy unmount. VS Code and other processes were using the directory but lazy unmount allowed it to complete.
Volume vol-07fe326ec1ea72fb4 successfully detached and is now in 'available' state.

Successfully attached and mounted older volume vol-0f42d827178f343d6 as /dev/nvme2n1 to /persistent. Volume shows 20GB used (vs 3.2GB on newer volume) with October 13 timestamps, indicating this is the correct older volume with more data.

SUCCESS! Found extensive project files in workspace including multiple project directories (agenticaihackathon, aws-security-agentcore-chatbot, faiss-rag-agent, etc.), documentation files (END-TO-END-GUIDE.md, PRODUCTION_TESTING_GUIDE.md), test scripts, and various development projects. This is clearly the correct volume with the expected project files.
